page.title: 20Children
page.content: Children growing up in the village have a fairly boring life. There aren't many clubs and not much to do. For the very young there is the playgroup which is held twice a week. For children aged 8 and under there are swings and things. For 9 year olds there is nothing becuase they are too young for the clubs. They just walk around the streets playing games or most of the boys in that age group go around being stupid throwing stones at other kids etc. For children over 10 there is a fair amount to do. They can go to the badminton and drama club. They can play Football or Cricket or other sports in surrounding fields. If the weather is hot they can swim in the River Urr.
